page.title: 10Wool W.I. Golden Jubilee
page.content: When Wool Women's Institute reached its 50th anniversary, we held a Golden Fun Day for the whole village. A children's pet show and a W.I. Market started the day.A carnival procession was the highlight of our celebrations, led by Wareham Town Band and headed by the W.I. "float" entitled "50 Buzzy Years".This depicted a flower garden, beehive and swarm of 'bees' portrayed by W.I. members.Other floats entered by Cub Scouts, Brownies, Badminton Club, Toddler's Club, Youth Club, etc, were colourful and varied.The Recreation Ground was filled with stalls, sideshows, children's races and a Mr Lovely Legs contest.An energetic family Barn Dance ended the day in a hall full of golden balloons and flowers, and all agreed our Golden Jubilee would be well_remembered.
